ygData.subject: Um.. Aqualungs wont sell for 300pp
ygData.msgSnippet: I dont know about you guys, but if an item costs in components alone - 225pp (or so). And I m not trivial in making it. There is no WAY I could make any profit
ygData.messageBody:
I dont know about you guys, but if an item costs in components alone - 225pp
(or so). And I'm not trivial in making it. There is no WAY I could make
any profit selling it at 300pp. In fact, that means you have a success rate
of 75% JUST to break even!

Does my tinkering suck? Are you guys making 3 successes out of 4 tries on very
non-trivial stuff? Or even better assuming your profitable?

I have found I need to charge 2.5x on non-trivial to make any profit. Thats
560pp, not 300pp. Sorry, I'm still not too impressed with Aqualungs -
especially at that price.
